scripts.local: sam build --profile personal-dev && sam local start-api
scripts.deploy:dev: sam build --profile personal-dev && sam deploy --profile personal-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: sam build --profile personal-dev && sam deploy --profile personal-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: sam build --profile personal-dev && sam deploy --profile personal-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=prod
